name: Assistance of private employees authorized
text: §107-7  Assistance of private employees authorized.  The performance of work under this chapter may include the employment of private land surveyors, engineers, and photogrammetric engineering assistance when necessary, and the cost in connection therewith shall be borne by the department or agency concerned. [L 1951, c 283, §5; RL 1955, §103-5; HRS §107-7]
